title: Tivo SaaS Template
short: Tivo is a free HTML SaaS Landing Page template built by Inovatik.
body: ‘Tivo’ is a free HTML SaaS Landing Page template from [HTMLrev](https://htmlrev.com/). Features include sticky header navigation with links that scroll seamlessly to page sections. A clean services overview and lightbox feature carousel, video modal, pricing table, testimonial slider and working forms for service sign-up, log in as well as a newsletter sign-up. [See more details](https://htmlrev.com/tivo-saas-app-landing-page-html-template-50)! ## Related Posts: * [Smash Lite Template](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-03-13-smash-lite-template)
